17298.「おお！ 聞こえているか！\n どうやら術は 成功したようだな！:
Oh, my God! Can you hear me! Looks like the
trick worked!

17299.「おどろかせて すまない。\n 今のは ボクと 巨人族であるキミが\n 言葉を交:
I'm sorry for scaring you. That was just a
trick to allow me and you, a Titan, to
exchange words.

17300.「ボクの名は シグルド！\n 世界の均衡を守るべく戦う ヴァルハラの戦士！:
My name is Sigurd! I am a warrior from
Valhalla, fighting to keep the world in
balance!

17301.「キミの名は…… そうか <cs_pchero>か！\n ボクの想像どおり 猛々:
Your name is... well... <cs_pchero>! Your
name is as fierce and beautiful as I imagined.

17302.「勇猛な巨人族 <cs_pchero>よ！\n キミは 気づいているか？\n 我:
Brave Titan! Are you aware? The balance of
our world is beginning to shift.

17303.「ボクは それを食い止めるために 長い旅を\n していたが その途中で 先ほどの:
I was on a long journey to stop it, but along
the way I was caught by the giant bird I
mentioned earlier and trapped in this nest.

17305.「まったく とんだ目にあったが\n これも <cs_pchero>に 出会うため:
I had a terrible time, but it may have been my
destiny to meet <cs_pchero>.

17306.「キミに 相談したいことがあるんだ。\n すまないが 仲間の待つ ヴァルハラの館:
I need to talk to you about something. I'm
sorry, but can you take me to Valhalla Hall,
where my companions are waiting?<yesno><close>

17307.「……なんだって？\n キミは 人に頼まれて 巨鳥に奪われた指輪を\n 取り返し:
What? You were sent by a man to get back the
ring that was stolen by a giant bird.

17308.「それなら 優先すべきは その使命だな。\n まずは その指輪を 持ち主に届けよ:
Then our priority is the mission. First, we
must deliver the ring to its rightful owner!

17309.「勇猛な巨人族 <cs_pchero>よ！\n ボクの足では 移動するのに 時間:
Valiant Titan <cs_pchero>! It takes me a
long time to move on my own two feet. Let me
get into your bag.

17311.かばんの中から シグルドの声が聞こえる。: I hear Sigurd's voice from inside his bag.

17312.「どうやら これで\n キミの使命は 済んだようだな！: Looks like you've done your job!

17313.「それでは すまないが ボクの仲間が待つ\n ヴァルハラの館へ 向かってくれ！:
Then I'm sorry, but to Valhalla Hall, where my
companions await!

17314.「じつは 幸運なことに ヴァルハラの館は\n この 巨人族の町にあるんだ！:
Actually, lucky for us, Valhalla's mansion is
in this Titan town!

17315.「あの階段を上がれば 巨人族の住まう\n 特別 大きな家がある。そこに入って\n:
Up those stairs is a special large house where
the Titans live. Enter there and go to the
room with the pink-colored door on your right!

17316.「皆！ 遅くなって すまない！\n ボクだ！ 今 帰ったぞ！！: Hey, guys! Sorry I'm late! It's me! I'm home!

17317.「おおっ シグルド様！！\n よくぞ…… ご無事で お帰りになりました！:
Oh, Mr. Sigurd! I'm so glad you're back safe
and sound!

17318.「おケガが ねえようで なによりです。\n アッシらは 皆 シグルド様の お帰り:
I am glad to hear that you are not injured. We
have all been anxiously awaiting Sigurd's
return.

17319.「ところで その巨人族は……？: By the way, are those Titans...?

17320.「あの者の 視線をあびても\n 身体が動く！ ということは…………:
I can move my body even under his gaze! That
means...

17321.「シグルド様！ ついに巨人族の戦士に\n ふさわしき者を このヴァルハラの館へと:
Master Sigurd! At last you have brought a
worthy Titan Warrior to Valhalla Hall!

17322.「<pc>。我々 ヴァルハラの戦士は\n 先ほどの術の かかっていない 巨人族の:
. We, the warriors of Valhalla, are immobilized when we are exposed to the gaze of the Titans who have not been subjected
to the same technique as before.

17323.「これは 我々が 世の理に背いたゆえの制約。\n ヴァルハラの戦士は もとは皆\:
This is a restriction because we have defied the laws of the world. Every warrior in Valhalla was once a warrior who died in
battle.

17325.「さあ！ キミを このヴァルハラの館へ\n 招いた理由を話そう。:
Come on! Let me tell you why I invited you To
Valhalla Hall.

17326.<center>キミたち 巨人族は 知らないだろう。\n世界は 調停者オーディン:
You Titans don't know that the world is ruled by a great being called Odin the Mediator. That the world is ruled by a great being
called Odin the Mediator.

17327.<center>万物は 調停者オーディンにより\nその形 その在り方を さだめら:
All things are permitted to exist by Odin, the
Mediator, who determines their form and their
way of being.

17328.<center>その オーディンの かたわらには\n我らの主であり 世界の均衡を:
At Odin's side was our Lord, the Fate's War
Maiden, who has the power to maintain the
balance of the world.

17329.<center>しかし…… 調停者オーディンは\n突如 天命の戦乙女を いずこか:
But... suddenly Odin the Mediator took the
Fate's War Maiden away and began to upset the
balance of the world.

17330.<center>オーディンは……\nこの世界を 闇に葬ろうとしているのだ。:
Odin...is trying to keep this world in the
dark.

17331.「……我々は ヴァルハラの戦士だ！\n 必ずや 我らが主 天命の戦乙女を奪還し\:
We are the warriors of Valhalla! We will
surely take back our Lord, the Fate's War
Maiden, and restore balance to the world!

17333.「天命の戦乙女の 行方を探すためには\n 三賢人と呼ばれる方々の おチカラを\n:
In order to find the whereabouts of the Fate's
War Maiden, we must enlist the help of the
Three Wise Men.

17334.「三賢人とは 英知の結晶……。世界の均衡を\n より堅牢なものとする チカラを持:
The Three Wise Men are the fruits of wisdom and have the power to bring about a more robust balance in the world, but we do not
know their whereabouts.

17336.「勇猛なる巨人族 <pc>よ！\n このヴァルハラの館には 古来より\n ある言:
Valiant Titan <pc>! In this house of
Valhalla, an ancient legend has been passed
down from generation to generation.

17337.「世界の均衡が 崩れかけし時\n 選ばれたる巨人族の戦士が 我らの道標となり\n:
When the balance of the world is about to be
shaken, a chosen Titan Warrior will be our
guide and save the world from darkness.

17338.「ボクは あの巨鳥と戦うキミを見て 確信した！\n 巨人族の戦士に ふさわしき者:
When I saw you fight that giant bird, I was
convinced! You are the only one worthy of
being a Titan Warrior!

17339.「<pc>！ 我ら ヴァルハラの戦士の\n 道標になってくれ！ 盟友の契りを結び:
<pc>! Be a beacon to the warriors of
Valhalla! Join us in the bonds of allyship,
become a Titan Warrior, and fight with us!<yesno><close>

17340.「しかし このままでは 世界は\n 闇に 葬り去られてしまう！\n 頼む……キミ:
But if we don't, the world will be left in
darkness! Please... we need you!

17341.「ありがとう <pc>！\n キミなら そう言ってくれると 信じていた！:
Thank you <pc>! I knew you would say
that!

17342.<if_woman>「皆 しかと見よ！\n 彼女こそが 我らの道標となる\n 巨:
<if_woman>Behold! She is the Titan Warrior
<pc>, who will be our guide!<else>
Behold! He is the Titan Warrior
<pc>, who will be our guide!<endif>

17343.「心強き 盟友を得た今\n 我らの勝利は 約束されたも同然だ！:
Now that we have a strong ally, our victory is
as good as assured!

17345.「フッ バカバカしい。\n 付き合っていられませんね。: Hmph. Ridiculous. I can't keep up with you.

17346.「愚鈍な巨人族ごときが\n 調停者オーディンを相手に\n 何が できるというので:
What can a race of stupid Titans do against
Odin the Mediator?

17349.「ハーゲンよ。キミの 戦士としての能力は\n ボクも買っている……。しかし 盟友:
Hagen. I admire your abilities as a warrior...
but I will not allow you to taunt my ally, the
<pc>!

17350.「さあ 巨人族の戦士 <pc>よ！\n 粗末な品だが これを受け取ってくれ。\n:
Come, Titan Warrior <pc>! I know it's
not much, but take this. It may help you a
little.

17351.「我々は 全力を尽くして\n 三賢人の居場所を 探しだしてみせる！:
We will do everything in our power to locate
the Three Wise Men!

17352.「何か わかったことがあれば しらせよう。\n それまでは 休息を取っていてくれ:
I'll let you know if I learn anything. In the
meantime, get some rest!

17353.「巨人族の戦士 <pc>よ！\n 今 ボクたちは 全力を尽くして\n 三賢人の居:
Titan Warrior <pc>! We are now doing
our best to locate the Three Sages.

17354.「何か わかったことがあれば しらせよう。\n それまでは 休息を取っていてくれ:
I'll let you know if I learn anything. In the
meantime, get some rest!
